title: KILLSWITCH ENGAGE's JESSE LEACH Discusses The Legendary DAN SWANÖ
description: There's always a ton to say about Swanö. The post KILLSWITCH ENGAGE's JESSE LEACH Discusses The Legendary DAN SWANÖ appeared first on Metal Injection.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 5 hours ago
excerpt: There's always a ton to say about Swanö.
text: We caught up with Jesse Leach of Killswitch Engage for our Artist on Artist series where he spoke about Dan Swanö of Edge Of Sanity (and about a million other bands), how Swanö changed heavy metal and inspired so many projects along the way, and more! Check out the full interview above and catch Killswitch Engage at one of their very many tour dates in support of their new record This Consequence below! Get your tickets for the multiple tours right here. html:
We caught up with Jesse Leach of Killswitch Engage for our Artist on Artist series where he spoke about Dan Swanö of Edge Of Sanity (and about a million other bands), how Swanö changed heavy metal and inspired so many projects along the way, and more!

Check out the full interview above and catch Killswitch Engage at one of their very many tour dates in support of their new record This Consequence below! Get your tickets for the multiple tours right here.
